entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 23.
